text: The Living Corpse () is a 1968 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Vengerov.Народный артист СССР Алексей БаталовЖИВОЙ ТРУП (1968) It stars Aleksey Batalov, Alla Demidova, and Oleg Basilashvili. == Actors == * Aleksey Batalov as Fyodor Protasov (Fedya) * Alla Demidova as Yelizaveta Andreyevna Protasova (Liza) * Oleg Basilashvili as Viktor Mikhajlovich Karenin * Lidiya Shtykan as Anna Pavlovna * Sofiya Pilyavskaya as Anna Dmitrievna Karenina * Yevgeny Kuznetsov as Sergey Abrezkov * Svetlana Toma as Masha == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1968 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Living Corpse (1968 movie)
